FLEXFIT interlocking FIBERS work quickly to TRAP LEAKS

Designed to fit your body and its every move for a protective leak barrier while swimming, running or other activities.
body.description: Product Description Playtex Sport Tampons have a 360° design and FlexFit technology that moves the way you move. Whether you’re running, swimming or leading your team to victory, Playtex Sport lets you Play On.Protection For Bodies In Motion. Brand Story By Playtex From the Manufacturer Designed to give active women extra protection during exercise and other activities. View larger.Playtex Sport with FlexFit fibers Protection for Bodies in Motion 360° Sport Level Protection tampon design to fit your body and its every move for a protective leakage barrier. FlexFit interlocking fibers work quickly to trap leaks. 2-layers of interlocking fibers to protect against leakages. Contoured applicator for comfortable, precise placementWhat's in the Box Playtex Sport Tampons, Unscented, Super (36 count).Playtex Sport Unscented TamponsRegular 36 ct.Super 36 ct.Super Plus 36 ct.Playtex Sport Body WipesSinglesTravel PackTampons are associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Please consult the product insert for further information. WARNING SIGNS OF TSS ARE, FOR EXAMPLE, SUDDEN FEVER (USUALLY 102° F OR MORE), VOMITING, DIARRHEA, FAINTING OR NEAR FAINTING WHEN STANDING UP, DIZZINESS, OR A RASH THAT LOOKS LIKE A SUNBURN. IF THESE SIGNS OR OTHER SIGNS OF TSS APPEAR, YOU SHOULD REMOVE THE TAMPON AT ONCE, DISCONTINUE USE, AND SEE YOUR DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY. IMPORTANT FACTS ABOUT TSS:There is risk of TSS to all women using tampons during their menstrual period. TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. There are scientific studies that have concluded that tampons contribute to the cause of TSS. The reported risks are higher to women under 30 years of age and teenage girls. The incidence of TSS is estimated to be between 1 and 17 cases of TSS per 100,000 menstruating women and girls per year. REDUCING YOUR RISK OF TSS:You can reduce the risk of developing TSS during your period by alternating tampons with feminine pads. You can avoid any possible risk of getting tampon-associated TSS by not using tampons. There are scientific studies which have concluded that higher absorbency tampons increase the risk of TSS. You should select the minimum absorbency needed to control your flow to reduce the risk of developing TSS. Tampons are available in a range of absorbencies: Regular Absorbency (6-9 grams), Super Absorbency (9-12 grams) and Super Plus Absorbency (12-15 grams). Each absorbency range represents the grams of fluid that can be absorbed by all manufacturers' tampons based on a standardized laboratory test. Use this information to compare the absorbency of these tampons to other brands. If you have had warning signs of TSS in the past, you should check with your doctor before using tampons again. Consult your doctor if you have any questions about tampon use and TSS. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The comfort, durability, and discreet size and packaging is A1. I will continue to buy and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and work great
reviews.reviewText: I have used this brand for 20 years and have stuck with it because they are comfortable and get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tampons, not just for girls
reviews.reviewText: Obviously I haven't got any first hand experience using this product as designed. However, on the occasions I have shown up at the house after a trip to the drug store without this particular brand, I was... well... in the doghouse. Apparently they work great as intended. Guys, be awesome and get extra so she never runs out. Also, add to your subscribe & save to prevent the same problem AND keep you from doing the drug store shuffle with this beautiful bright pink box.For those of you who camp or do outdoors stuff, there are a ton of other uses for tampons, including water filtration and tinder for fire starting. So if not for her, get some of these for you and learn how to use them outside their designed purpose. Stick to unscented if you intend to suck water through one. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Not too sure what to say other than they get the job done. I really like the Playtex “sport” product line.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It keeps my wife from turning her crotch into a ...
reviews.reviewText: It keeps my wife from turning her crotch into a crime-scene. That's a product I can get behind.Coupons please?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The product is great the delivery was awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps those flood-waters in check as life keeps you moving!
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a product that delivers when many others don't! If you have the mother of all floods and can't stop life until it slows down, throw a few extra in your purse and get going ... These do the job! The S+ is even better on the worst of days :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: These are the best, most comfortable tampons
reviews.reviewText: I can find these in Scotland so I turned to Amazon as per usual. These are the best, most comfortable tampons. Fast shipping and a decent price (not America decent) but when you really need your brand you don’t really argue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this brand, the pointed and centred head made it easier to enter the body and very newbie friendly. But now the head becomes more round and I don't know why at least 1/3 of them look like the picture - the cotton is out of the tube before you even unpacked it, they are broken!!! Disappointed. Hope the brand will do something to improve it!
For first time tampon users, it is the best! It is easy to put it due to the length, didn’t feel it when walking. Highly recommend!
These worked about as well as expected. East, comfortable, no applicator issues, absorbent.
